hops.message: Admin router successfully registered with FastAPI app
DELETE endpoint defined at /v1/admin/users/{user_id} with proper authentication dependency
Function implementation contains critical model inconsistencies
UserStatus enum missing DELETED status referenced in admin router
Frontend admin console references delete action but no API integration found
No test files found for admin delete user functionality

defects.msg: Route attempts to set user.status = UserStatus.DELETED but DELETED status does not exist in UserStatus enum
Suspension functionality references fields (suspension_reason, suspended_at, suspended_by) that don't exist in User model
Frontend handles delete action but lacks actual API integration - no HTTP calls implemented
No unit tests exist for admin delete user endpoint - critical security functionality is untested
Router uses /v1/admin prefix but API documentation may need updating for consistency
